A woman who hates cats (Alice Krige) and her son (Brian Krause) have moved into a small town, and must deal with a mean cat-woman (Deborah Harlan), an image of their pet rabbit-toaster, has just been shaped on the wall of their home. Are they cursed to suffer an apocalypse?
